actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to include among the services eligible for Federal assistance under such title the installation of devices to promote the security of the elderly in their homes.

summary.text: Amends title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to include among the services provided under that title the installation of security devices in the homes of the elderly.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to include among the services eligible for Federal assistance under such title the installation of devices to promote the security of the elderly in their homes.
